Open 'https://www.example.com/item/12345'

Verify the 'Add to Cart' button is visible, displays 'Add to Cart' text with font size 16px, font weight 700, initial background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, border radius 4px, padding 12px 24px
Verify the 'Add to Cart' button on hover background color transitions to #0056b3 over 200ms and its width is 180px
Verify the 'Add to Cart' button right margin is 10px

Verify the search input field has placeholder 'Search products...', width 250px, height 38px, font family 'Arial', initial border 1px solid #ced4da, font size 14px, aria-label 'Search field', is initially empty with no value, left position 20px relative to its parent container
Verify the search input field border color changes to #80bdff when focused
Open 'https://www.example.com/about'
Verify the 'About Us' navigation link is visible, displays text 'About Us', has font size 15px, default text color #333333, font weight 500
Verify the 'About Us' navigation link when active text color changes to #007bff and has bottom border 2px solid #007bff
Verify the 'About Us' navigation link has top padding 8px, left padding 15px, and y position 20px from the top of the header
Verify the main hero image carousel component has a count of 3 images

Verify the current hero image has source 'hero_slide1.jpg', alt text 'Scenic landscape view', rendered dimensions 1200x400px, natural dimensions 1920x640px, loads within 500ms, has an 'Exclusive' watermark at bottom-right, opacity 1, and 5px margin from the top

Verify the embedded product video player has source 'product_review.mp4', width 640px, height 360px, is initially muted, 'Play' button animation occurs over 300ms, top position 100px, left position 50px, fullscreen button is visible, current playback time value is 0 seconds, video's border 1px solid #ccc, and overall video player background color #000000

Verify the user profile avatar in the top-right corner has source 'user_avatar.jpg', alt text 'User profile picture', rendered dimensions 48x48px, border radius 50%, 2px solid #cccccc border, background color #f0f0f0, opacity 1, right margin 20px, and top margin 15px

Verify the success alert message is visible for 5s, displays text 'Your order has been placed successfully!', has background color #d4edda, text color #155724, font size 15px, padding 16px 20px, border radius 4px, width 800px, fades out with a transition over 500ms, and is positioned at x 100px, y 80px
Hover over the 'Settings' dropdown
Verify the 'Profile' menu item is visible, displays text 'Profile', has font size 14px, default text color #333333, and background color transparent
Verify the 'Profile' menu item on hover background color becomes #f0f0f0
Verify the 'Profile' menu item has padding 10px 15px, width 200px, positioned 5px from the left edge of the dropdown parent, and top offset 40px relative to the dropdown header

Verify the 'Order Date' header cell displays text 'Order Date' with font size 14px, font weight 600, text color #666666, text alignment center, padding 12px 10px, background color #f8f8f8, bottom border 1px solid #e0e0e0, width 150px, and top margin 5px

Verify the pagination control's current page '3' button is active/selected, displays text '3', has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, border 1px solid #007bff, border radius 4px, width 32px, height 32px, right margin 5px, and font size 14px
Verify the total count of pagination buttons is 5
Click 'Open Modal'

Verify the modal overlay is visible, has background color rgba(0,0,0,0.5), opacity 0.5, covers full viewport with width 100% and height 100%, x position 0px, y position 0px, appears with transition duration 300ms, has no border, and its 'Close' button is visible

Verify the 'Remember me' checkbox input is enabled, has label 'Remember me', is unchecked by default, width 16px, height 16px, right margin 8px, border 1px solid #ccc, and its associated text label font size 14px and color #333333
Verify the 'Remember me' checkbox input when selected background color is #007bff and displays a checkmark

Verify the progress bar shows width 75%, has background color #28a745, height 8px, border radius 4px, displays value '75%' as text, fill animation is linear, top margin 10px, bottom margin 5px, opacity 1, aria-label 'Upload progress', and left position 0px
Hover over the 'Help' icon

Verify the tooltip appears after 100ms, is visible, displays text 'Contact support', has background color #333333, text color #ffffff, font size 12px, padding 8px 12px, border radius 3px, bottom position 30px relative to the icon, and fades in with a transition over 200ms

Verify the 'Facebook' social media icon in the footer has source 'facebook_icon.png', alt text 'Follow us on Facebook', rendered dimensions 24x24px, width 24px, height 24px, right margin 10px, border radius 50%, aria-label 'Facebook link', and background color #3b5998

Verify the 'Event Date' date picker input has initial value '2023-10-26', placeholder 'Select a date', font size 14px, text color #333333, background color #ffffff, width 150px, height 38px, aria-label 'Event date selection', and padding 8px 12px
Verify the 'Event Date' date picker input when focused border is 1px solid #007bff
Scroll down 500px
Verify the 'Go to Top' button becomes visible, has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, width 40px, height 40px, border radius 50%, bottom position 20px, right position 20px, and opacity 1
Verify clicking the 'Go to Top' button scrolls the page to scroll-top 0px within 800ms

Verify the dropzone element has default border 2px dashed #ccc, background color #f9f9f9, width 600px, height 200px, displays text 'Drag and drop files here', font size 16px, padding 20px, and text color #555555
Verify the dropzone element when a file is dragged over border changes to 2px dashed #007bff and background color becomes #e9f5ff

Verify the 'Shipping Info' accordion panel header displays text 'Shipping Info' with font size 16px, font weight 500, text color #333333, background color #f0f0f0, padding 12px 15px, has bottom border 1px solid #e0e0e0, and left margin 0px
Verify the 'Shipping Info' accordion panel header when active background color becomes #e2e6ea
Verify the 'Shipping Info' accordion panel header has a count of 3 items inside

Verify the product quantity selector input has initial value '1', width 50px, height 36px, text alignment center, border 1px solid #ccc, border radius 4px, font size 14px, text color #333333, is enabled, and right margin 5px
Verify the maximum selectable quantity count is 10
